dublinCore.title: 113 S515 IS: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the Yellow Ribbon G.I. Education Enhancement Program to cover recipients of Marine Gunnery Sergeant John David Fry scholarship, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Brownintroduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to theCommittee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the Yellow Ribbon G.I. Education Enhancement Program to cover recipients of Marine Gunnery Sergeant John David Fry scholarship, and for other purposes.

section.header: Expansion of Yellow Ribbon G.I. Education Enhancement Program

subsection.text: Section 3317(a) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by strikingin paragraphs (1) and (2)and insertinginparagraphs (1),(2), and(9) .
The amendment made bysubsection (a)shall apply with respect to academic years beginning after the date of the enactment of this Act.
